title: Video Sponsorship Operations Lead
location: New York, NY, USA; Los Angeles, CA, USA
description: Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing businesses grow.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 5 years of experience in digital media, sales, marketing, or product roles. Experience working with digital organizations. Experience identifying and recommending ways to improve product and customer strategy.
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge of the online video/TV ecosystem and media/marketing landscape. Ability to manage multi-faceted projects with multiple stakeholders. Ability to influence partners toward a desired outcome and enlist them as advocates. Ability to create internal and external-facing materials, while distilling important information for audiences who are unfamiliar with the nuances of systems.
responsibilities: Collaborate with internal sales teams and external clients to recommend budget reallocations, upsells, and content optimizations, ensuring full campaign delivery. Provide guidance to YouTube Content teams and external vendors, ensuring execution and addressing weekend/after-hours support needs. Oversee communication for sponsorships, including campaign setup, updates, and product testing with internal and external partners. Manage offshore vendor sponsorship support, providing training, guidance, and process improvements in collaboration with cross-functional teams.
